::KitKat::

She heard the outside alarms go off as the predacons opened fire on 
the base.  She activated the autoguns and fired on Megatron, Hell 
Beast and the others.  5 autoguns,  firing three shots apiece at the 
invading Predacons.  (Let me know if this breaks the rule ok?)

She opened her comlinks. "Destructor, Famine,  DarkMouse, Drillbit, 
Starscream, The base is under attack, repeat, the base is under 
attack."  She called on the clone, "Megatron, report to the bridge."

The clone got up and walked to the bridge.  She looked at the clone 
and desided wait until it was time to bring him out.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron, followed by Waspinator, Gremlin, Hell Beast, 
Paddletail, and 
> Aquarios opened fire on Kitkats base, sending bits and peices of it 
flying 
> off.
